title: The Jungle book
creator_credit: Stephen Sommers, Raju Patel, Edward S. Feldman and Walt Disney Pictures
brief_description: A faithful adaptation of Rudyard Kipling’s classic tale of Moglie the jungle boy who is raised by wolves after being lost when a tiger attacked an encampment and killed his father. Years later he finds himself re-united with his childhood love Kitty and back in the “civilization” of Colonial India which he finds far less civilized then his jungle haunts. The search for a lost treasure shows who the truly civilized members of society are. Cast includes Jason Scott Lee, Cary Elwes, Lena Headey, Sam Neill, John Cleese, Jason Flemyng.
